column4: hi can anyone help me, i cannot connect to my wireless network. i can tell u any information needed
Please give more info... was it working before?
go to http://linux-wless.passys.nl/ and see if your wireless card is compatible with linux, if it isn't, you'll need to use ndiswrapper.
let's move over to a private room and I'll try to guide you through it... join channel #leith, OK?
